summary: The diff shows only changes to backend/main.mo (backend logic) and project_state.json (metadata). There is no evidence of URL configuration changes, deployment settings updates, or frontend modifications that would implement REQ-1. The requirement to update deployment URLs from draft to production/custom domain is completely missing from the implementation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the deployment URL configuration to change from the current draft website URL to a new custom URL or production domain
missing_requirements.reason: No deployment configuration files were modified. Expected changes to dfx.json, canister configuration, Internet Identity redirect URIs, or frontend environment variables are absent. The diff only shows backend logic changes and metadata updates.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure all internal links and references point to the new URL
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend files were modified to update hardcoded URLs, API endpoints, or internal references

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the old draft URL redirects to the new URL or is decommissioned
missing_requirements.reason: No redirect configuration or deployment decommissioning steps are present in the diff

hallucinated_features.description: Backend authorization and access control implementation
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for URL migration with maintained functionality. The diff shows new authorization logic, permission checks, and access control that were not requested. The constraint was to maintain existing functionality, not add new authorization features.
